Reason: The configuration option 'slow_query_log_timeout_in_ms' in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. A lower timeout value may result in quicker identification of slow queries but could also increase system overhead due to more frequent logging, while a higher timeout value may delay the detection of slow queries but reduce the impact on system performance. Therefore, the value of this configuration can directly affect the system's execution time and resource consumption, making it performance-sensitive.
